column1: How do you create test plans, test cases, and test scripts based on requirement documents and business User Stories?
Can you explain your experience in developing and maintaining automated test suites using test automation tools and development languages like Python?
How do you execute test cases, document test results, and raise defects when necessary?
What experience do you have working with JIRA, Confluence, qTest for test case management, defect management, test reporting, and other functions?
Can you describe your experience participating in agile ceremonies like Sprint planning, grooming sessions, stand-up meetings, demo sessions, and retrospective meetings?
How do you participate in E2E and integration testing?
Can you explain your experience participating in defect triage and Scrum meetings?
